sources.title: Dangerous Afternoon (1961)
sources.description: The manager of a halfway house for female ex-cons takes action when a blackmailer threatens to expose her secret. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/dangerous-afternoon-1961/

metadata.Plot: A boarding house run by a former criminal who's made ammends since she's become paralysed is home to a group of older women - all whom also have criminal pasts. Word soon arrives that a former associate of the ail housemistress is looking for her - with plans of blackmail.
metadata.Actors: Nora Nicholson, Diana Chesney, Richard McNeff
